website_summaries.verdict: Crystal-clear voice recording and playback are big draws for this handheld digital recorder.
pros: Housed in a sturdy metal casing
cons: Battery-save feature switches off recorder too quickly for some
Few-second lag between hitting “record” button and actual recording

customer_reviews.title: I like a lot of the features
customer_reviews.text: I like a lot of the features, but one feature I did not check carefully BEFORE buying it was a REWIND feature. YOU CANNOT REWIND A RECORDED FILE! I just cannot find a reason why a simple but important feature like that is not included in the design. I already threw away some of the packing materials when I discovered this flaw. Shown above was my original review. The vendor emailed me to point out that THERE IS A FORWARD AND REVERSE function in this device. It's a little tricky, but it is functional. Therefore, I changed my two-star rating to FOUR STAR rating.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar M.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the money....Take time in the set up.
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time figuring out how to set this one up, but once I did, the recording is amazingly clear and using it is easy. Important that you set it up as an mp3 or wav if your computer can handle wav. Mine cannot and I would have lost everything if I had not carefully set it up. Super to have done that. and now good clear recording.
customer_reviews.author: Ngirilover

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it to record some presentations and it works well for me. It’s light weight and easy to operate. The quality of the recordings is good, so I am happy with the selection. Would definitely recommend the Recorder by Dictopro!
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: that’s a good thingy. Even my Bulldogs bark for treats
customer_reviews.text: Again, I couldn’t get more than 10 seconds of recordings at a time, so I called Dictopro customer service, and their suggestion to click on factory reset, and system reset, and try again. It worked! Now records for the needed times to collect the wanted audio sessions. Months of success; that’s a good thingy. Even my Bulldogs bark for treats, sounds natural; And My yelling, “Get out of my face” was clear and natural also. 😏
customer_reviews.author: sfldogs

customer_reviews.title: Two thums up
customer_reviews.text: Slim & lightweight. I bought this item for my daughter to use for recording lectures at college. The device is very easy to use & has a good sound/record quality. I like the auto off feature, allowing for easy use for college students to switch between recording for different classes. Microphone range is about 15 to 20 feet (the furthest we've tried so far). Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S

customer_reviews.title: Great price and audio
customer_reviews.text: The number one benefit is the affordable price. As a consultant who does brand research, I often record interviews. The clarity is amazing. I've "sold" two to colleagues who have observed me using the recorder. The downside is the poor translation to English of the directions. It took me awhile to figure out how to use it. Transfer to your PC is easy, however, finding the recordings isn't always. Despite the issues, I still recommend the player and its unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: had an issue. this company has best customer service ever
customer_reviews.text: I had and Issue with my unit. I posted I was frustrated. Soon after I n.v receive a letter in the mail from aleksey who immediately took action. He replaced the unit and followed up without me having to ask. He kept me informed, followed up to ensure it was working and was just so satisfying. I wish all companies were as thoughtful. We all know sometimes things happen. I have just never experienced such proactive support in my life. The recorder is great for sure... and the company dictapro is a reliable company you can trust. I love my recorder dictapro x100 add a special thank you shout out to Aleksey. A+++++++
customer_reviews.author: WildPetals

customer_reviews.title: This little recorder is awesome! It is very sensitive & clear & because ...
customer_reviews.text: This little recorder is awesome! It is very sensitive & clear & because of it's small size very easy to conceal. I thank you!!! This recorder really literally saved my life from a very dangerous narcissistic psychopathic brother that was threatening me. He was so cunning & covert that every time I called the police he would be so polite & cunning with his lies that they didn't believe me until I was able to record his threats with this recorder.I played the recordings for the judge in court to get him forcibly removed from my property. Then I made a YouTube video 'Rants of a Narcissistic Psychopath' from the recordings to warn all my neighbors & community about him.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Big Bummer!
customer_reviews.text: This worked just long enough to be ineligible for return. I bought for my daughter for Christmas, so it sat in a wrapped box for a month and then she has only used it a handful of times. It no longer works and we are unable to fix. :(
customer_reviews.author: Julie G.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift. If you are in the market for ...
customer_reviews.text: The perfect gift. If you are in the market for a voice activated tape recorder, Dictopro is hard to beat. I'm not much of a electronics guy, so I was concerned about the ability to operate the recorder. In just a few minutes I was recording songs and conversation like a pro. Plus, the owner of the company emailed me a couple of times since my purchase to make sure I wasn't having any problems with their product. I have recommended this recorder to several of my friends. If your looking for a sturdy, small, yet powerful recorder, look no farther. Dictopro will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: It is not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is not easy to use. I can not for the life of me figure out how to set it to voice activated recording!!! the only reason I needed it. It records fine but the manual is not clear on how to set it to voice activated and it is very frusrtrating
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great audio recorder
customer_reviews.text: Still learning how to use the recorder, but so far, I like it. The quality of the voice recordings is clear and crisp. It does pick up some background noise but I think I can use one of the filters to filter that out. It is versatile, but that also means it's complicated -- requires reading the manual to see all the features and settings. I think the best thing is the clear & crisp quality of the audio recordings. Plan to use this to record meetings and post online. Simple transfer of files to the computer. I think it will be a very useful tool for our meetings. Looking forward to playing with it some more!
customer_reviews.author: Reflady

customer_reviews.title: Good range and clear recording. Excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts very long time. I don't charge for days. The most I am from the teacher is twenty feet but it records nicely with clarity. I like that I can use an auxiliary cable and listen directly from the device in the car. I really recommend you read the manual thoroughly because it's a pain to go through the options the first few times I used it. It made me annoyed but I did figure it out. This thing is super tiny fyi. Like the length of my finger. Don't lose it! It barely weighs anything. It would make a very inconspicuous recording device if you ever needed that.
customer_reviews.author: Pluma

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to understand directions/
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to record meetings and make notes for record. Small size could be a plus, but I prefer something a "little " larger. Its Not just take out of the box and use, you have to study the manual a lot. I ended up making notes to make it easier and larger print. Instructions are confusing mainly because some times the reference to a button like play is by symbol, and sometimes by function. All in all I should have found my old cassette recorder and and had the device I would be able to easily use.
customer_reviews.author: LD & DLG

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied with my purchase of this product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very user friendly voice recorder. Purchased this product for college classes to record lectures of classes allowed by professors. Some of my nursing classes are large in size and having to be in a large classroom, sometimes a good distance away from professors...the recordings are clear as ever and sound as if the voice was right next to the recorder. I love that I can upload these recordings right to my Apple laptop with the cable provided, and it is also a rechargeable battery within the recorder with a USB charging cord. Also very compact. Definintly satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: No fast fwd or rewind
customer_reviews.text: Had some trouble getting it to playback more than 10 seconds, did a reset on it and it worked fine. Only reason for 3 stars is you can NOT fast forward or rewind your recordings. When using it for meetings (as I do), during playback if you aren't sure what was said you have to start from the beginning of the recording to get to the point you want to listen to again. Frustrating at best... other than that it works great, good pickup during meetings. Maybe if I download it to a computer I could manipulate the data better. Haven’t tried that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Got it Today, Instructions Not Clear
customer_reviews.text: I read instructions and tried to test the device. Definitely complex. Very complex. The device seems solid and looks good. If I can figure it out ---- which I think will not be easy ---- I'll then update my review. I should have read some of the one star reviews before buying. My grand daughter may get this as a going to college present as she might be better able to decipher this. Don't these companies ever do customer test runs on the instructions and product ??? JimBene
customer_reviews.author: jim bene

customer_reviews.title: happy recording
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the compactness of the unit. I had purchased a recorder years ago and it was the size of a remote. The unit is small but the sound quality was very good and the buttons were of a size even old geezers like me can handle easily, The screen was small but has to be yet it is very clear and easy to read
customer_reviews.author: jgk

customer_reviews.title: Good recorder and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great little recorder that handles my basic needs. It actually does a better job of recording talks then I thought it would when the speakers voice is somewhat muted. I had a Olympus recorder before and this one is a considerable improvement. I bought it for my school, to record the most important lessons at it works great !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ina Caici

customer_reviews.title: *update* great customer service!! Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: **update** Within a few days of posting my review I was contacted by DICTOPRO customer support offering to replace my defective recorder. I must say I was shocked and pleased because that kind of customer support is rare. Bought in August 2018. It has already stopped working just over a year later. It does not charge or come on. Now I have lectures I am unable to access from school. When I bought it I had issues with the charge cord/cable not transferring files and they replaced with just a short charge cord that doesn't do data transfer. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy D

customer_reviews.title: Headache inducing. Hard to use. Destroys files. Confusing instructions
customer_reviews.text: The worst purchase I ever made on Amazon. It comes with tiny, confusing instructions. I spent an hour recording a chat, then a week later the recording just disappeared! Gone! I have had computers since 1991 and DVR recorders, IPads, Iphones and other consumer electronics and none of them gave me 1/10 the trouble this thing has given me. If you value your recordings avoid this thing.
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: A real review!
customer_reviews.text: This is second one I have purchased and has just completely stopped working and doesn’t get any power. Shows no sign of life and it’s downright a crime so sell such junk. I don’t recommend it or the company selling them because they offered to replace first one free of charge then couldn’t get a response or the replacement... I should of known then!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Stover

customer_reviews.title: It can record even the quietest talkers!
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. Playback is better with headphones. It is just a bit smaller than I had anticipated, takes a bit of practice handling. However, being so small, it is very discrete. It also is picking up my very quiet speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Fortuitous1

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed that it records up to 70 hours. Bought it for my husband to record the lessons while in massage school. It works great and have multiple microphones on it.
customer_reviews.author: Annette N.

customer_reviews.title: The great one that offers DICTOPRO!
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied with DICTOPRO, his recording is demuy good quality, very easy to use, recording It is very clear. I use DICTOPRO for ghost hunting, I use it for medical information and its operation is gradual. I recommend that you treat it, it will be very useful and I know you will be satisfied also of its operation. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Spirit5

customer_reviews.title: it does not explain what the functions do to better give the consumer the best quality sound
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant when I first got the audio recorder. There are a lot of functions on the device that I had no idea what they are and how to use them. the directions tell you how to use the device, however, it does not explain what the functions do to better give the consumer the best quality sound. After E-mailing the company they held my hand and explained what each recording setting does to enhance my lecture classes in school. Well done on responding to my questions.
customer_reviews.author: philip

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: Great little recorder - we got it to support a 'hostile workplace' complaint and it was perfect for the task. The voice activated option, small size, and easy operation were great. I'm sure we will use it for other things now since it is so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Crumbliss

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: When I received my Dictopro the Dictopro had recordings on it as if someone had returned it. Also it did not come with a charger so it is all but useless for me too expensive to return. It was charged and I did try to record and the steps it takes to record are quite confusing. You can't just hit record you have to remember to hit another button to save. Also there is no fast forward or reverse on the recordings. Have been unsuccessful to download to my PC so far. I like the size and the sound is okay. Looking for another option
customer_reviews.author: Maineshtrbug

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to record meetings and it does a fantastic job of this. I didn't buy it to record music but it does a very good job and sounds just as good as my Walkman. I only have one complaint. They shouldn't have bothered to include the ear buds as they were utterly useless. They won't stay in my ears and one was dead while only very low tinny sound came out of the other. The ear buds for my Walkman work great with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Garner

customer_reviews.title: KEEP LOOKING!  DON'T STOP HERE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Dictopro Digital Voice Recorder and it worked for a month or so, but then the battery just died. I contacted the company and they told me to smash it, take a photo of it (and send the smashed photo to them) and then they would send me another one. So, I did all that, and they sent me another one, which only lasted about two weeks before it's battery stopped working. This is a piece of TRASH recorder. SAVE YOUR TIME AND MONEY. Find a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Charles

customer_reviews.title: Read Review
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this recorder, it is made VERY well and small enough to hide in your pocket or shirt pocket. I had recorded a few conversation, and most came out pretty good, some really good, and some very distorted because of loud background noise. I lost it or someone stole it in less than two weeks, so I don't have it. Bummer! I needed some of those recordings.
customer_reviews.author: 4given2_4give

customer_reviews.title: An amazing digital recorder!
customer_reviews.text: This an amazing digital recorder! Great for recording classes, seminars, sermons, or teaching. It is small and extremely well made. It is easy to bring with you anywhere because of its small size. The sound quality of the recordings is exceptional! I would definitely recommend this product if you need to record audio!
customer_reviews.author: Marc J Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Digital Voice Activated Recorder by Dictopro,...
customer_reviews.text: the instructions were not the easiest to understand, however, after more time than I thought it would take, I understood the process. The recorder is fabulous. The sound is crystal clear and when recording with VOR recording starts immediately. The unit is compact and fits almost everywhere. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ) Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and was exactly as advertised :) Easy to use, small and lightweight. I would recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: T. Gray

customer_reviews.title: it's so useful
customer_reviews.text: i like it because it's easy to operate.I like its size too and the the battery last long.i usually record the music I like and connect it to a speaker
customer_reviews.author: thess

customer_reviews.title: Always check back if you have a question!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so the first unit had some problems. Dictopro sent a replacement unit voluntarily without even my asking once they noti ed my situation. The second unit turned out to be amazing! It came fully charged, excellent detailed case, controls are firm and positive, playback recorder quality to be admired by competitors. Got to be the best deal on the market! You can pay more; yet, not get the features and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Aultman

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a college student and I don't have time for a product that is a pain in the neck to figure out. THIS is SO easy to USE!!! I love the clarity! It really is a great deal!!! If you're a student and need to record lectures, THIS IS THE PRODUCT YOU NEED!! I like that I can transport the files to my computer and add the audio files to my iPhone. This way I get to listen to lectures wherever and whenever!! I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Recorder at the price with excellent audio quality.
customer_reviews.text: Used this product to record granddaughter's concert. Had problem with playback which was readily fixed with support tech via email. Fast response to question. Audio quality is excellent. Use of controls requires practice as several buttons have multiple functions depending on what you are trying to do. Keep the manual handy for reference until you become familiar with the sequences you are using. For the price, this unit has quality far above other units I have and nice small size with excellent batter life. Highly recommend this unit for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bill K.

customer_reviews.title: Great recorder if you have small hands!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in order to record a family members boss who kept harassing him. It's a great little recorder and picks up both sides of the conversation easily but it isn't easy to work with his big hands especially while being discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Devina Dotson

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it's made
customer_reviews.text: I'm not having much luck with this recorder. I love the way it's made, it's small enough to to hide pretty easy but I think it's a little complicated to work. also you can forget trying to record anything if you have to put the recorder in your pants pocket and most women don't wear shirts with pockets. for someone who is not very tech savvy it's not a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Junetta Mitchem

customer_reviews.title: Love this recorder
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this recorder for my wife as she pursues her music degree. She needed the recorder quickly so that she could practice with it before she needed to use it in her lesson. The recorder arrived quickly and we began to test it immediately. The recorder is high quality and easy to use. Its controls are not completely intuitive, however, they are clearly identified and defined in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M. Lake

customer_reviews.title: Great recorder!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it to test it out, but so far, I really like it and it works well. The sound is very clear, and after reading the detailed instruction booklet, easy to use. I purchased this recorder because I liked how the questions asked were most often answered by the company. This company really seems to stand behind its product with great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: am

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic recorder. Exactly what I was looking to purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic recorder. Exactly what I was looking to purchase. I now have the final instrument to finish my non-fiction book .
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for recording lectures
customer_reviews.text: I got this last week and so far only used it once for my world art class (2hr lecture class) It works but I’m going to have to mess with the mic sensitivity because if my teacher walks across the room his voice becomes softer which is kinda hard to hear. Other than that it works and is easy to use. It also came fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product a bit small in my large hands, but nice to put notes on while i am driving, like to mileage when i cross a state line, I drive 18 wheeler, and any random thoughts i have
customer_reviews.author: NEIL B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing voice recorder
customer_reviews.text: I am a journalist, so a good voice recorder is one of the most important tools I have. I got so much more than "good" when I bought this digital recorder. It is a great product and does everything I need and then some. The recordings are crystal clear no matter what kind of noise is around. I love this recorder and I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandie

customer_reviews.title: low tech ability
customer_reviews.text: it's okay a little confusing because I am not tech suave. I was able to record and play back what I recorded but I don't really like it because I really can't figure out how to use it. I get lucky at times. directions sucks
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, it works
customer_reviews.text: Recording quality great. User friendly NO. I'm listening back on my recordings and the machine tends to turn itself off if I don't immediately skip to the next recording after one finishes. Super annoying. But at least it records unlike the last one I bought on amazon(which broke immediately after first charge)Would not purchase again but I am keeping the one I bought. If you're a tech genius this should be a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Realy nice recorder
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for this handy recorder. Fits in your pocket. Great to take note to yourself. Handy to keep in your purse.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Recorder and box contents.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item today. In the box was the recorder, manual, earphones, & 2 usb cables. Missing are the telephone jack wire, telephone adapter, & 3.5 audio line-in wire. Not an impressive start. Will edit review after using it for a week. Revised review: After clearing up the confusion about box content, I am happy with the product. I find it easy to use and small enough to fit in pocket to carry with me. Using it on a daily basis. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RickyT

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AS EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Great for recording class or business meetings, not so great outdoors since it picks up a lot of noise (maybe I need to tweak the configuration for better results). Mini USB cable that came with it has some problems since it takes a few tries to get computers to recognize the device for file transfer
customer_reviews.author: Cristina I. Poma

customer_reviews.title: OLD TECH, OLD REVIEWS.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to operate and no Bluetooth to transfer data. There are other better alternatives. Clearly, I did not do my research well and will not recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: JC and Ali

customer_reviews.title: Top of the Line!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginning writer and bought this product to use while interviewing different people to get an opinion about their state. It is small, voice activated with an almost Bose quality to the recorded sound, no slurring or skipping words. I lay it discreetly on the table while the interview is in progress and normally I will get a question about it because it is a handsome piece of equipment, small compact and professional looking and very easy to use. I could not be more pleased with this product and am very glad I chose it!
customer_reviews.author: sammylane

customer_reviews.title: worked a couple times
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in late October, and gave it extremely light use. Like, listened to a couple podcasts and recorded a meeting. Now in early January it's stopped working. There's a factory reset, but I can't get to it as the screen is just gibberish. Edit: The company is replacing the item. You know that weird feeling when you get all worked up for a fight with a company and then they just fix things with no fuss and you got worked up for nothing? That describes my interaction with these guys. Products break, it happens, I couldn't have asked for a better fix, though.
customer_reviews.author: fbaer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Very compact, easy to use, customer service is awesome! If you are looking for a high quality recorder at a reasonable price I strongly advise getting a Dictopro. Also as mentioned above customer service is fast, efficient and friendly (a very rare thing to find these days)!!
customer_reviews.author: JOANNE L.

customer_reviews.title: Looking for better
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get the recorder when I ordered it, but less pleased with it after it was delivered. The Dictopro appears to be well built with a strong metal body and an excellent graphic display. However, the menu up/down switch only works in the "down" position, making the scrolling more difficult and time consuming. In addition, the operating directions are so poorly written that the manufacturer directs you to a web site for a better guideline. Unfortunately, the same person who wrote the original garble appears to have written the improved version, which is only marginally better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The recorder is pretty good. The first impression from the device itself: it should work for years. I guess the body of the device is made of metal. Sound is clear and loud enough. Battery keeps long. The only 'cons' is buttons: they are small, and it took some time for me to get used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Mykhailo Shevtsov

customer_reviews.title: poor tascam clone, no aux functionality
customer_reviews.text: This does not work for the purpose I needed it for, which was the record using a 3.5mm lapel mic. The "Line in" 3.5mm input does NOT work for this, you'll need another option. Also, in case you have any other issues with this seller, the refund took over 6 weeks and there was a 15% restocking fee. I'd suggest looking at other options. I went ahead and got the tascam which works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mort52

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I bought it for a conference I was going to, hard to keep up with the note taking, and it worked beautifully!! I was at a distance from the speaker as well and just turned it on and set it down. I played it back later and the sound was really good quality with minimal background noise interference if any at all! I haven't attempted to transfer any of the files to a laptop so I can't comment on that process, but overall, great recorder and worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sara C

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable
customer_reviews.text: this product is extremely durable and does its job very well. However the microphones are not incredibly sensitive so if you are planning on recording a lecture with this, i would recommend sitting in the front row or as close to the professor as you can.
customer_reviews.author: Noble

customer_reviews.title: THIS RECORDER IS GREAT FOR ATTORNEYS . . .
customer_reviews.text: This recorder is great for a host of reasons, but one of the biggest of those reasons is the affordable price. As an attorney practicing law, it is hard to remember every detail from a consultation between me and a client. Hence my need to record interviews. The clarity of this recorder is better than those I have purchased in the past.amazing. Transferring files to your PC is easy, and if there is any downside to this recorder it would be initially locating your files after a recording session. Despite that one lone issue, I still recommend the player and its unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jake York

customer_reviews.title: Randomly stops recording
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice little recorder. very sturdy and looks so nice! My only problem is it seems to stop recording sometimes or a loud static takes over and as i leave it on the professors desk I don't realize it until it is too late. I'm not sure what's causing this but it has only happened 3 out of 7 lectures. I'm still trying to figure it out. Otherwise, it's great! If anyone has any input on my problem, I would definitely appreciate it!
customer_reviews.author: kalyn

customer_reviews.title: Recording on iPhone is better and way easier than this
customer_reviews.text: Paid $53 for this recorder. The quality of playback is terrible. You have to download the recording to your computer for the quality to be descent. There is no ease of use either. It's constantly asking me if I want to erase all my recordings. I actually have to pay to return item. Should've looked at return policy for bad quality item prior to purchase. I have it set up as wav file but my MAC wont recognize the device so I can't transfer files.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Performance in an actual recording setting
customer_reviews.text: The product is not intuitively easy to operate. The instructions are rather confusing and I find it insulting that I have to provide an instagram photo to participate in any award programs. I bought the item to record meetings to provide minutes of the proceedings, so the device has yet to to be fully tested. I hope it is up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I did have to read the instructions, but once I got the hang of it, I fell in love. This is so simple to use; you just have to do a little trial and error before your first real use. Tiny, portable, picks up conversation in meetings.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie B.

customer_reviews.title: Cool look but...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool look, solid build, unfortunately very unpredictable battery life, so most of the times I use it plugged in USB of the laptop. Using it for learning language to check my pronunciation it is not a problem for me, but but you might get upset if recording stops during lecture, meeting or in some other situation where you can not connect it to power supply. Device sometimes shuts off to save batt but sometimes is still on the next day, so maybe if you would remember to turn it off after use, batt would last a bit longer than it does... Some things are not perfect, but look very good, so I still buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Andante

customer_reviews.title: I like the looks and size
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks and size. I have not had time to use it yet but looking forward to down load my favorite music. arrived on time and is as described.
customer_reviews.author: EMB

customer_reviews.title: Right choice
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very easy to use. I was worried about picking the right one since there are many to choose from. I don’t regret this purchase at all. Very happy with it. It much faster and easier than writing my random thoughts down.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Early Opinions
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the Dictopro for a couple of weeks but already have opinions. The unit has excellent pickup and sound quality, plenty of storage, and good battery life. My only gripes are minor. If it is important to be able to use with one hand, some features are very difficult to do. The unit is not ergonomically friendly to use while doing anything else with your other hand. Starting and stopping recording work OK one-handed but other functions not so well. I do not use the voice activation feature so cannot comment on that. A feature that would be nice but is not there is to be able to fast forward or rewind portions of a recording.
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: It's on my list of best buys! In addition
customer_reviews.text: I boughta recorder for my daughter to record lectures in the classroom. She loves it.The sound is clear and picks up well. It's on my list of best buys! In addition, I put in a rush order for next day delivery. Again, not disappointed, it was delivered the next day as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sounds are downloaded to my computer have been of excellent quality. I also appreciated the followup done by ...
customer_reviews.text: A solidly built small handheld Dictaphone that so far has worked perfectly. I'm currently using it to do interviews. The sounds are downloaded to my computer have been of excellent quality. I also appreciated the followup done by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Dan W. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Dictopro Digital Voice Recorder
customer_reviews.text: After rating this product rather low and giving my reasons for the low rating, within 10 minutes of my post a representative of the manufacturer contacted me by phone and explained my issue with the battery and the instruction manual. to my satisfaction. I appreciated the quick response and satisfactory explanation and have decided to keep the recorder. The rating was due strictly to my misunderstanding of the recorder features. I recommend this recorder for: 1) Its compact profile, 2) East of use,(3) Up to date relevant instruction manual that is easy to follow and 4) its is rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: ernest barrett

customer_reviews.title: My husband got this recorder as a birthday gift from ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this recorder as a birthday gift from me. He is blind and can't figure how to set up the menus and he wishes you had a model of this recorder with voice guidance. He loves the metal case. I can't help him because I am also blind. Maybe you could come out with voice guided models. He wants to keep the recorder and have someone set up the menus for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon  Schauer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT RECORDER - RECOMMEND THIS ONE
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product, which is full of features and easy to use. I am using it for home security purposes. It has trouble hearing over the neighbor's A/C unit (which is not that unexpected). It can easily catch the fish tank noises from a separate room - very good sound quality too.
customer_reviews.author: safe&sound

customer_reviews.title: Device used not new as described.
customer_reviews.text: Device delivered was used not new. The seal on the box had been broken, the battery was already charged, and there were files on the device from a prior owner. In addition, volume control does not work. Prior ratings of this seller indicate a pattern of selling used merchandise as new. I have contacted Amazon and am waiting to see what they will do to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Small but difficult to use for multiple recordings.
customer_reviews.text: After my review, I received multiple attempts by the company to make it right. Perhaps the unit did not fit our needs but we really appropriate the unsolicited follow up by the company to make thing right. That is worth at least 1 additional star. L Handy, compact and sleek. No ability to attach to lanyard so dropping can be an issue. It is easy to miss recordings due to the inobvious button function. USB charge that lasts many hours.
customer_reviews.author: L Chang

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter so she could record college classes and not have to worry about trying to take notes at the same time. She loves it, says it is so clear even if she is not in the front of the classroom.
customer_reviews.author: FinnGirl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a gift for my hubby for his Spanish class. Function as describe. UPDATE REVIEW AFTER USING 2+MONTHS (May11): This recorder has some issues on its volume. The volume is so low. Even though my hubby recorded at the front row right in front of the teacher, and supposedly the volume is loud. When it play back, all the sound became so low, barely hear it. Dislike it :( Unfortunately can't return after usage.
customer_reviews.author: lamay

customer_reviews.title: Good little recorder
customer_reviews.text: The battery life was not what I had hoped for, our recorders that take batteries last much, much longer. The sound quality is great, but getting it to playback is nearly impossible, we have to download and playback. Sound quality though is superb, very impressive! Great little recorder if you don't have the need for it to run for hours or need instant feedback. I have had for almost a year and will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Nice recorder so far.
customer_reviews.text: I really have not used the recorder enough to know if I am 100% satisfied with it. I do appreciate the company sending me updated directions on how to use it. I have done a test on it and it seems to be what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiagirl34

customer_reviews.title: Not your granddads' voice recorder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this un tandem with Dragon Software (voice to text). The interaction is seamless. Long battery life on Dictapro, no batteries to worry about as it plugs into computer via usb port. It charges as it works. When you pair it wuth Dragon, you export your voice recordings into Dragon, it converts to text, you're able to edit your work with lightning speed. It has vox as well as manual on/off. Lots of neat features. Excellent gift for students.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaloves2

customer_reviews.title: This digital recorder is excellent and is great at picking up all content from ...
customer_reviews.text: This digital recorder is excellent and is great at picking up all content from busy, noisy meetings. Very user friendly and easy to download content to my desktop.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bentley

customer_reviews.title: He said the all around quality is awesome for as small as it is
customer_reviews.text: This was a Birthday gift for my husband. He uses it for recording his songs. He’s a musician.
customer_reviews.author: Penny M. DeCoteau

customer_reviews.title: Great recorder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this digital recorder for my husband. When he tested it and went to transfer it to his laptop, it didn't work. We were ready to return the item, but decided to use a different USB cord and it worked. Turns out the USB cord sent with the item was defective. Other than that, the recorder is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sue T

customer_reviews.title: Has performed well so far
customer_reviews.text: So far this recorder has performed the way I need it to. I am a secretary for a social club and have to take minutes. I find I need a recorder because people talk too fast. This recorder charges quickly and is easy to use. The sound quality is fine and it picks up even quiet people. My one complaint is that I do not find it easy to play, stop, fast forward, etc on the recorder itself. I usually transfer the wav file (super easy) to my pc and listen/navigate through Windows Media Player. Other than that, I have found the battery life and other features to perform quite well.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: This works better than my cell phone for recording meetings
customer_reviews.text: This works better than my cell phone for recording meetings. Seems to reach voices that are farther away... but it needs to be centrally located for best results in meeting rooms. The function instructions are a little hard to understand but once you've got the concept of how the buttons work, it gets easier. Overall - great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price, need some tech knowledge to operate
customer_reviews.text: Item came on time, no damage. The box it came in says up to 580hrs recording time instead of the 700hrs in the description box. The manual isn't​ as straightforward as it could be, but after deciphering a few basic functions, a lot of things became self-explanatory. Haven't had a functional/mechanical problem so far, excellent recording quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear recording even at a distance!
customer_reviews.text: Did not have to have it close and it captured everything perfectly clear. Playback to rewind and fast forward was easy. Instructions were easy to follow. Fits perfectly in your hand. Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: kelly green

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed in this product and seller
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this recorder to attend a training seminar for 2 days. I paid 5000.00 for this training and wanted to have this recording for future reference. This recorder not only records at a low level, but it didn't even have the space for a 2 day 8 hour training. After the first day, it said memory full. I recorded it in the mp3 format that was recommended. I received a message from the seller asking me how did i like it. I explained it to him and all he could offer was a generic email to do a reset to possibly fix the problem. There is a learning curve to use. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Qmarshall

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice hand held recorder. It has a good range for picking up voices and is easy to place "out of the way" if you wish. The instructions in the guide were easy to follow and very clear. Product is nice looking with the blue screen and yet small enough to carry in a pocket or purse. Fast delivery and great customer service follow up from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R. Belair

customer_reviews.title: great audio quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It's durable and really small but the best feature is the quality of recording you get without a lot of background noise. It is also surprisingly lowd. It is definitely worth the money maybe more.
customer_reviews.author: Archemedis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very high tech. Works great. Great piece of equipment for paranormal investigations.
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't save audio files
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, for some reason this audio recorder doesn't support the files it records in. I got it to record lectures and it only worked once. Every other lecture has a non-existent audio file when I finish the recording, even though it is showing correct functionality when I turn it on and press record. It will run correctly and save when I stop the recording, but when I go to listen to the file it says it is an unsupported file system, even though I haven't altered it from the device and it is in a supported WAV format. It's also not very responsive when I try to play directly from the device. Overall, a very annoying product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: picks up voices from a good distance, has great play back and a battery ...
customer_reviews.text: Where do I begin, I was skeptical at first because the "High end" recorders sell for much more. I actually bought one and returned it the same day when I seen this product on amazon. I used it for a week before adding a comment so I could give accurate feedback! This product is what your looking for, it's small, picks up voices from a good distance, has great play back and a battery life of forever!! just kidding, battery life is very long!!
customer_reviews.author: Creedmoor6.5

customer_reviews.title: A great recorder at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this 4 stars only because I found the menus a little confusing. However, after using it and getting used to it I am now giving it 5 stars. The voice quality is way better than I expected and now I intend to use it for voice overs in my Final Cut Pro videos. I just connect the recorder to my iMac, select the voice file and move it into FCP. This is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: It encrypted and DESTROYED my PhD recording in less than 1 month!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!!! It worked for about 3 weeks. I started having trouble connecting the device to my computer to download (I downloaded after each recording, thank God). All of a sudden, ALL of the recordings were encrypted and virtually destroyed! I immediately took the device to the computer repair shop and there was nothing they could do! I lost a recording for my PhD dissertation! It was less than 30 days from purchasing, so I got a full refund. Don't risk It! Go with a more reliable brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid recorder
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized recorder at a good price. Records well, and it I easy to use, A little heavier than I expected, but it helps the quality.
customer_reviews.author: F. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Dictapro
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made micro recorder that is made of metal not plastic . It has a color screen and intuitive menu. Although this product is new to me and I have not learned all of its functions it seems better than a previous similar sized Olympus model. Addendum: To months later the Dictapro is still working as advertised and is a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Linder

customer_reviews.title: Love this recorder!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good recorder. It is very user friendly. I have bought it twice now. I washed the first one in the washing machine. My only complaint is its not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Kroll

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to spy on my son while he is in school. I place it in his backpack and he doesn't know it's there. The sound quality is great! The one thing I don't like about the product is the inability to rewind or fast forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Digital Voice Activated Recorder by Dictopro- Easy HD Recording of Lectures and Meetings with Double Microphone, Noise Reduction Audio, Sound, Portable Mini Tape Dictaphone, MP3, USB, 8GB
product_meta.description:
DICTOPRO X100 - HD DIGITAL VOICE RECORDER WITH DOUBLE MICROPHONE

Experience Crystal Clear Recordings From Up to 40 Feet Away Right Now!

 - Are you tired of buying bad quality, cheaply made voice recorders that ruin your valuable information? 
- Would you like to record audio or music from up to 40 feet away and hear every minute detail played back on a built-in loudspeaker?

Introducing Premium High-Definition Digital Voice Recorder by Dictopro

 - Two ultra-sensitive microphones for HD quality recordings up to 40ft away 
- High quality metal body and color LCD screen 
- Ultra sensitive double microphone for clear audio recordings 
- Easily drag and drop your files to MAC or PC 
- VAR/VOR systems (Voice Activated/Operated recording) 
- Automatic on-time recording 
- Powerful loudspeaker built-in 
- Can be used as an MP3 Player 
- Digital clock and alarm functionality 
- A-B repeat functionality 
- Auto-off after 2 minutes of inactivity to preserve battery 

SPECIFICATIONS

 - Memory capacity: 8GB 
- Recording capacity: up to 700 hours 
- Material: aluminum 
- Recording format: MP3 / WAV 
- Recording bitrate: up to 1536kbps 
- Playback format: MP3 / APE / FLAC 
- Operation time: 10 hours

IN THE BOX:

- Digital Recorder Dictopro X100 
- USB 2.0 to mini USB charging cable 
- Earphones 
- User Manual

NOTE: The manufacturer reserves the right to change the package contents along with the product upgrade. Due to this, you may come across customers' photo/video reviews showing products/accessories that have been already upgraded or no longer included in the package. To learn the actual information regarding the package contents, please check IN THE BOX section.

Amazon Buyers Trust DICTOPRO to be a Brand that is Focused on High-Quality Products and Great Customer Service
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY ALUMINUM BODY - With a beautiful color LCD display, feels strong and sturdy, while being light and small. Conveniently fits in any palm, pocket or a purse for easy access and portability.
TWO ULTRA SENSITIVE MICROPHONES with DYNAMIC NOISE REDUCTION - Now you can enjoy crystal clear recordings even while you're up to 40ft away or to record quiet, discreet conversations.

VOICE ACTIVATED RECORDING - Means you don't have to click the record button every time to begin recording. Be it at the doctor’s office or a college lecture, the X100 will be your personal note-taker.
8GB OF INTERNAL MEMORY - Lets you store up to 700 HOURS of recordings without the need for additional memory cards. Use the huge internal memory capacity to store any other type of data files.

EASILY TRANSFER FILES TO MAC OR PC - Just connect the recorder to your computer using the supplied USB cable and drag the files over to your PC. It is really that simple! 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – Make everything you do more fun with X100 voice recorder or we'll refund you! 1-YEAR WARRANTY & 30-DAY RETURNS makes this a zero-risk purchase. (WARNING: Does NOT record phone calls with external microphone). For California Residents Only: Warning - Cancer and Reproductive Harm – P65Warnings ca gov

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars1,530 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
